name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AiBrow: Local AI for your browser

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Run small AI language models locally on your machine, allowing you to develop with the window.aibrow and window.ai APIs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AiBrow brings local AI to your web browser. It runs small AI language models locally on your machine, allowing you to prompt the AI in the Playground and also develop with the window.aibrow and window.ai APIs.

FOR USERS: bring small language models to the web, running locally on your machine. Set up your models once, and use them everywhere.

FOR DEVELOPERS: enhance your web pages with the window.aibrow and polyfilled window.ai APIs that allow your pages to prompt small language models on the user's device.

Configure your models once; after that, a web app can request your permission to send a prompt to your chosen model. Users are prompted to give permission before a language model is used on a domain.

Supported text models:
- SmolLM2 1.7B Instruct
- Gemma 2 2b Instruct
- Gemma 2b Instruct
- Phi 3.5 Mini Instruct
- Llama 3.2 1B Instruct
- Llama 3.2 3B Instruct
- Qwen2.5 Coder 1.5B Instruct
- Qwen2.5 1.5b Instruct
- Granite 3.0 2b Instruct
